main.connection

Class RingConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.connection.Connection
      • main.connection.RingConnection

  • public class RingConnection
extends Connection
    This class provides all the methods that internal nodes (those who belong to the Chord ring) call in order to request information on the Chord ring structure.
    Author:
    Martini Davide Distributed Systems class (AY 2017/2018), University of Padua, Master's degree in Computer Engineering.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class main.connection.Connection

        nodeAddress, ois, oos, s

      java.net.InetSocketAddress addressRequest(java.lang.String req)
      This method is called to request a node for its successor or predecessor
      java.net.InetSocketAddress closestRequest(java.math.BigInteger id)
      This method is called to request for the closest node in the ring preceding a specific id.

      • RingConnection

        public RingConnection(java.net.InetSocketAddress nodeAd)
        Unique constructor of the class
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • findSuccessorRequest

        public java.net.InetSocketAddress findSuccessorRequest(java.math.BigInteger localId)
        This method is called in the join procedure in order to ask a bootstrap node for the invoker's successor in the ring
        Parameters:
        localId - It is invoker's id
        Returns:
        The invoker's successor in the ring

      • addressRequest

        public java.net.InetSocketAddress addressRequest(java.lang.String req)
        This method is called to request a node for its successor or predecessor
        Parameters:
        req - It specifies whether successor or predecessor is requested
        Returns:
        The successor or predecessor of a node

      • closestRequest

        public java.net.InetSocketAddress closestRequest(java.math.BigInteger id)
        This method is called to request for the closest node in the ring preceding a specific id.
        Parameters:
        id - It specifies the start of the research
        Returns:
        The closest preceding node computed by the contact node

      • joinRequest

        public java.net.InetSocketAddress joinRequest(java.net.InetSocketAddress myself)
        This method is called when some (bootstrap) nodes are active in the ring. It aims to contact the invoker's successor and begin a join procedure if it can perform it.
        Parameters:
        myself - It is invoker's address
        Returns:
        The old predecessor of the invoker's successor (which can be now set as the invoker's predecessor)

      • getAndSetAvailabilityRequest

        public java.lang.Boolean getAndSetAvailabilityRequest(boolean status)
        This method is called to request and set a node's joinAvailable variable status
        Returns:
        A node's joinAvailable value, null if the connection failed

      • setPredecessorRequest

        public java.lang.Boolean setPredecessorRequest(java.net.InetSocketAddress newPred)
        This method is called to set a node's predecessor.
        Parameters:
        newPred - New predecessor's address
        Returns:
        True if the communication and the variable setting has been performed correctly

      • setSuccessorRequest

        public java.lang.Boolean setSuccessorRequest(java.net.InetSocketAddress newSucc)
        This method is called to set a node's successor.
        Parameters:
        newSucc - New successor's address
        Returns:
        True if the communication and the variable setting has been performed correctly
